help.long: Type "help <command>" for any of the commands to obtain further information.

tasks.short: Manages tasks, which are executed in regular intervals.
tasks.long:
Manages tasks, which are executed in regular intervals, if activated.
	Can only be used with subcommands.

tasks enable.short: Enables a task for regular execution.
tasks enable.long:
Enables a task for regular execution.
	Usage: tasks enable <taskname>
	Task names can be retrieved by issuing "print tasks"
